goal.ch:
數值優化廣泛用於許多領域和統計。商業、工業、生物統計學等方面的重要問題被表述為優化問題。在現代統計學中，例如在決策理論、實驗設計、調查抽樣和數據分析中，經常使用優化技術。本課程側重於優化技術及其在統計學中的應用。

該課程介紹了許多有效優化方法的全面和最新數據描述，同時提高了學生在工程、科學、商業和其他實際問題方面的編碼技能。
goal.en:
Numerical Optimization is extensively used in many fields and Statistics. Important problems in business, industry, biostatistics, and so on are formulated as optimization problems. In modern statistics, such as in decision theory, design of experiments, survey sampling, and data analysis, optimization techniques are frequently used. The course focuses on optimization techniques and their applications which are often made in statistics.  

The course introduces a comprehensive and up-to-data description of many effective approaches in optimization while enhancing students’ coding skills in engineering, science, business, and the other practical problems.
